name: Stay A While
content: When these stars start to fall
Will you love me will you call
你会不会爱我 你会不会呼唤我
I need you close don't run away
我亟需你陪在身旁 你不要离开我
Chasing highs in the midnight sun
在午夜太阳中 奔向未知的远方
We fought for love we were on the run
我们为爱献身 我们为爱奔逃
Tried my best to give you what you need
我竭尽全力 只为满足你的需求
所以再给我一次机会 不要离我而去
Made it way past broken hearts
忘掉那些心碎难过的岁月
你愿意为我停留片刻吗
We are still on the run
Made it way past broken hearts
忘掉那些心碎难过的岁月
你愿意为我停留片刻吗
We are still on the run
Made it way past broken hearts
忘掉那些心碎难过的岁月
你愿意为我停留片刻吗
We are still on the run
Lie down the big to your body
